metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35701 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Cacti 1.2.x through 1.2.16. A SQL injectionvulnerability in data_debug.php allows remote authenticated attackers toexecute arbitrary SQL commands via the site_id parameter. This can lead toremote code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35701` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.10+ds1-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cacti package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.10+ds1-1ubuntu1+esm1').
